articles.author: Sebastian Shukla
articles.title: Germany is unlocking billions to supercharge its military at a seismic moment for Europe - CNN
articles.description: “Do you think you can trust Putin?” German Brig. Gen. Ralf Hammerstein asks with a wry smile.
articles.content:
Do you think you can trust Putin? German Brig. Gen. Ralf Hammerstein asks with a wry smile.
Its a rhetorical question to which most of Europe would give the same answer no.
As the Trump administrat… [+6606 chars]

articles.author: Nicolas Camut
articles.title: Israel-Lebanon truce in danger after fresh attacks - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A new war “would be devastating for Lebanon,” Lebanese Prime Minister Nawaf Salam said.
